answers.answer: Thanks for using the forum.It is possible that the itching and anxiety could have a cause other than the diabetes. I would recommend that you speak with your doctor as they are best able to accurately diagnose and suggest a path to help you feel better.Cathy
There are many causes of itchy feet diabetes can be one of them.  a trip to the MD is a good idea.What do YOU call "good control of my hbA1c"

question: Hi,I am diabetes type 2 since 2 years, and recently I started to have feet itching and I am very anxious.I don't understand because I have a good control of my hbA1c.do I have to go to the doctor?Thanks in advance
title: feet ache, is it normal?
